letters.description: Evaluate the child's unique neurodevelopmental profile while aligning coaching goals with the family's core values.
Identify and coordinate essential medical, educational, and therapeutic resources to build a robust support network.
Cultivate deep emotional attunement and secure attachment to strengthen the parent-child bond through empathy.
Prioritize the parent's mental and physical health to prevent caregiver burnout and ensure sustainable family stability.
Adapt home routines and physical spaces to accommodate sensory needs and promote the child's daily functional success.
Equip parents with the communication skills and confidence to effectively advocate for their child’s rights and future.
